name: A Time Traveler's Clicky Emporium
description:
A Time Traveler's Clicky Emporium is an idle clicker game where you own a time travel emporium and send customers to different times! Your task is to earn as much currency as possible by sending customers to the correct time and completing quests. But be warned, you only have 15 weeks before the time police shut you down!

⏳ To play, click on the customers, read the quests, and select the right time to send them on their way. Correct answers earn money; wrong answers lose money. ⏳

A Time Traveler's Clicky Emporium is an entry into the "Clicker Jam Spring 2023". The game is not complete and will be updated after the jam is over ✨
